Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are very attractive for their high energy conversion efficiency and low emissions.
Titulo: Fabrication of 80 mm diameter-sized solid oxide fuel cells using a water-based NiO-YSZ slurry

Sentencas: Generally, a supported layer of SOFCs is fabricated by tape casting, using an organic solvent.
Titulo: Fabrication of 80 mm diameter-sized solid oxide fuel cells using a water-based NiO-YSZ slurry

Sentencas: Recently, a slurry based on water instead of an organic solvent has been sought in order to avoid environmental pollution.
Titulo: Fabrication of 80 mm diameter-sized solid oxide fuel cells using a water-based NiO-YSZ slurry

Sentencas: In this study, the anode of SOFCs was fabricated by aqueous tape casting, and the electrolyte and the cathode were deposited by screen printing.
Titulo: Fabrication of 80 mm diameter-sized solid oxide fuel cells using a water-based NiO-YSZ slurry

Sentencas: The I-V characteristics of the cell thus obtained were evaluated.
Titulo: Fabrication of 80 mm diameter-sized solid oxide fuel cells using a water-based NiO-YSZ slurry

Sentencas: As a result, an 80 mm diameter-sized cell with a power density of 0.33 W/cm(2) at 800 degrees C was successfully fabricated by controlling sintering conditions.
Titulo: Fabrication of 80 mm diameter-sized solid oxide fuel cells using a water-based NiO-YSZ slurry
